ARABIC: فَكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا ذُكِرَ ٱسْمُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُم بِـَٔايَٰتِهِۦ مُؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Eat that over which the name of Allah has been mentioned, if you have iman in His Signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Eat only that over which the name of God has been pronounced, if you truly believe in His commands.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: If you believe in the signs of Allah, eat (the flesh) of that over which Allah's name has been pronounced.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If you have faith in God's revelations, eat the flesh of the animal which has been slaughtered with a mention of His Name.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So eat from that over which Allah’s name has been mentioned, if you believe in His signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So eat of that on which Allah's Name has been mentioned, if you are believers in His Ayat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore eat of that on which Allah's name has been mentioned if you are believers in His communications.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Eat of that over which God's Name has been mentioned, if you believe in His signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Eat of that over which the name of Allah hath been mentioned, if ye are believers in His revelations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Eat then, only that over which God's name has been pronounced, if you truly believe in His revelations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore eat of that whereon the name of Allah hath been pronounced, if ye are believers in His revelations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Eat from that over which Allah’s Name has been mentioned, if you are believers in His signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So eat of (meats) on which Allah's name hath been pronounced, if ye have faith in His signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So eat of that (meat) on which Allah's Name has been pronounced (while slaughtering the animal), if you are believers in His Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Eat then of that over which the Name of Allah has been mentioned (when slaughtered), if you truly believe in His verses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So eat of that over which the Name of God was pronounced, if you indeed believe in His revelations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So eat of that [meat] upon which the name of Allah has been mentioned, if you are believers in His verses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [6:118]   So eat from that over which God’s Name has been invoked, that is, [that which] has been sacrificed to His Name, if you believe in His signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Eat of that over which the name of Allah hath been mentioned) of immolated animals, (if ye are believers in His revelations) in the Qur'an. 148
